1100101110101000 0001100111110001 1 -> sum: 1110010110011010, cout: 0
0001001010101100 0010000001100111 0 -> sum: 0011001100010011, cout: 0
1010101101001010 1011110000000000 1 -> sum: 0110011101001011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
